titles.title: To reduce temporarily the duty on unit asy-battery hi volt.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Trade.

committee.name: House Committee on Ways and Means

bill.summary: 4/27/2005--Introduced. Amends the Harmonized Tariff Schedule of the United States to suspend, through December 31, 2008, the duty on nickel-metal hydride storage batteries, exceeding 300 V (unit asy-battery hi volt), designed for use in certain hybrid motor vehicles.
